channel.title: N00b thinks he can dupe items ;D
channel.description:
I think you guys'll like this. I just got this PM:
Hello , i readed the topic how to do you Spawn stuff... you writed works like this: Yeah. If you drop all of your items you want to clone, wait 5 seconds exactly, then press ctrl+f7, then wait another 5 and press ctrl+w. That'll clone them but when i drop shrimps and wait 5 seconds and press ctrl + f7 and then wait 5 seconds and push ctrl+w it not works help me!!! i need to know how to clone items!! plz tell me!!!
So I sent him back this:
Ah I got it. I forgot a bit. If you drop all of your items you want to clone, wait 5 seconds exactly, then press ctrl+f7, then wait another 5 (must be exact) then click on a bit of page surrounding RS (not on the applet, just on the blank page) then wait as long as you like and press ctrl+w and that should clone them. Good luck!
Lets see how he does ;D

So does Ctrl+W.
[/quote]
in ie. not in good browsers[/quote]

In FireFox too.
Lawlz.
